name: Tinkaton
description: The Hammer Pokémon. This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)

abilities.name: Own Tempo
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to becoming confused.

abilities.name: Pickpocket
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, this Pokémon may use a reaction to attempt to steal the creature's held item with a Sleight of Hand check contested by the target's Passive Perception. After the first attempt, all other attempts against the same opponent are rolled at disadvantage.
